overview: This 4th episode of Nikita Bellucci's Obsessions is certainly not the least perverse: First teasing and adventurous when she strips outside in the middle of the night, Nikita then tests her husband's fidelity with a conniving girlfriend, then willingly gives in blindfolded to a stranger before dominating Angel Emily in an S&M way and, cherry on top of the cake, revealing once again her addiction to anal sex.
title: Obsessions 4
